name: Off the Grid (offlebaggins)
description:
Made in 3 hours for Friday Night Game Jam 46!

Overscoped and missing most of the game parts but enjoy chopping and burning wood as a little quad dude living off the grid!

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROW KEYS - move

SPACE - Jump (sometimes double jump but it's a little wonky, just go with it)

J - Chop

K - Grab/Drop wood
